title: Patrol and troop meetings
brief_description: Designed for use in the training of Scoutmasters. Shows typical activities at a troop meeting from the arrival of the Service Patrol through to the last “Goodnight, fellas”. The film cautions on the need for flexibility in the conduct of meetings, emphasizing that there is no such thing as a standard meeting.
